about_the_game:
What is it about

Experience the oppressive atmosphere of Sublimity in this demo and immerse yourself in the mysterious world of the backrooms.

In this restricted area of the backrooms, characterized by the iconic yellow walls, dim neon lights and endless corridors, you will learn the basic game mechanics. You will sneak and hide from an ominous creature while using your parkour skills to overcome obstacles.

Demo

The demo offers you around 30 minutes of intense playtime, with your urge to explore determining how deep you will delve into the secrets of the backrooms.

You also have the opportunity to test different graphics settings to adapt the gaming experience to your system. Not only can you enjoy the oppressive atmosphere to the full, but you can also get a first impression of the visual quality of the game.

  • Impressive graphics: High-quality graphics offer players an intricate and frightening world to explore.

  • Stealth and skill: The gameplay is based on stealth tactics supported by parkour-like movements.

  • True survival horror: You are not a fighter - Try to survive the horrors of the backrooms, you must either flee or hide

name: Sublimity Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: i5-8400 / Ryzen 7 2600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: i5-11600K / Ryzen 5 5600
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 / AMD RX 5600 XT
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

short_description: Slip into Chloe's shoes and explore the creepy backrooms for 30 minutes. Sneak, hide, climb - it's all there! Find hidden clues and test your nerves against a nasty monster. Free to play, perfect to see if your PC can handle it. Do you dare to enter the backrooms?
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Portuguese - Portugal
*languages with full audio support
